document_data.caption: Facet-cut citrine gemstone.
document_data.name: Citrine
document_data.mainbody: '''Citrine''', also known as '''false [[topaz]],''' was a variety of [[wikipedia:en:quartz|quartz]] whose color ranged from pale yellow to brown.
document_data.Description: This [[Semi-precious stones|semi-precious stone]] cleaved nicely and was usually [[wikipedia:facet|facet-cut]] in brilliant or marquise styles. A typical stone had a base value of 50 gp.
document_data.Powers: Any being wearing or carrying a citrine was protected against ''[[magic jar]]'' spells and spell effects. Ironically, citrine gems were one of the favored receptacles for the "jar" when casting ''magic jar''.
